title: 11: S6E11 – "Come Hither and Give Horror" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you three classic horror stories from authors Dr. Douglas Hyde, Robert Louis Stevenson, and M.R. James, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about cursed corpses, dastardly doctors, and awful artifacts – drawn from the depths of some of history’s most macabre minds.  

                                 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
